title: Gettysburg National Military Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   News               Photos & Multimedia               History & Culture               Nature               Education               Kids & Youth               Management               Bookstore         Â    News Press releases and park event information.  Photos & Multimedia Photos and multimedia presentations. History & Culture Learn about the people and places that make up the battle. Nature Animals, plants, environmental factors, natural features, and ecosystems. Education Plan a field trip, curriculum materials, traveling trunks, and more. Kids & Youth Become a Junior Ranger and learn about the park.  Management Laws, policies, and public involvement. Bookstore Books, DVD's, audio battlefield tours, postcards and more.
